item.description: Résumé I am a student in Big Data. I have a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering & Computer Science. I love programming and doing some data stuff. Currently looking for an apprenticeship in the DATA field. Skills Languages Python, R, SQL, Javascript, Java, PHP, C#, HTML5, CSS3 Machine Learning & Deep Learning Scikit-learn, Tensorflow Web Development Backend Flask, Laravel, Java Enterprise Edition, ASP.NET MVC Frontend Bootstrap, JQuery, Ajax, ReactJS, VueJS, Sass Business Intelligence Tableau Desktop, Power BI, Saiku Analytics, Talend, Pentaho Database Management Systems SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, HBase, Mongodb Others Android, Hadoop, Azure, Docker Work Experience Software Developer Intern CERGI SA, Lomé-Togo - (June 2018 ~ Oct.
